text: Hey all :wave:  we just put out a patch release for boilerplate (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v1.3.1>) that adds in a `_default-modules.css` style-sheet with styles set to add some basic styles for the default menu and simple menu module based on the settings for that module (e.g. the orientation and flyout options).
